display_long_description:
# WELCOME TO HOTEL INFINITY 

Walk the winding halls and grand ballrooms of a mysterious hotel using your own two feet. Hotel Infinity allows you to explore vast areas from your living room without the need of controller-based movement or teleportation.  

**Hotel Infinity is best experienced in Roomscale with a play area of 2m by 2m (6 ft 7 in. by 6 ft 7 in.).** 

[media]

# EXPLORE IMPOSSIBLE SPACE  

Through seamless blend of portals, lifts, impossibly winding hallways, and other architectural deceptions, Hotel Infinity allows you to explore vast areas by physically walking around your play area.   

[media]

# REALITY-BENDING PUZZLES  

The hallways aren't the only impossible feature of Hotel Infinity. Some of the hotel's secrets are buried deeper than physics would normally allow.  

[media]

# HIDDEN MYSTERIES  

Every corridor leads somewhere you’ve never been, and no room is ever quite the same. Explore at your leisure, but don’t wander too far.   

We hope your stay is eternal.      

[media]

# Features: 
- A mind-bending VR experience from the creator of Manifold Garden  
- Roomscale-first design, creating vast spaces to explore in a 2m by 2m (6 ft 7 in. by 6 ft 7 in.) area 
- Alternative locomotion controls for those who aren't able to play in Roomscale 
- Laryssa Okada (composer of Manifold Garden) returns with an original soundtrack  
- Navigate impossible spaces and solve enigmatic puzzles
